alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bay, southwestern Calhoun, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/... At 701 PM EDT/601 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Vernon to 16 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Live Oak, Ebro, Southport, Seminole Hills, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Youngstown, Brannonville, Vicksburg, Majette, Nixon, Bayhead, Red Bay, Recota Beach and Greenhead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
